quotes.quote: Let other people do it their way. What other people do is irrelevant.
Emotion without action is irrelevant
Unrelated doesn't necessarily mean unrelated. Allow ideas to dwell with one another.
There is nothing insignificant in the world. It all depends on the point of view.
Ask an impertinent question and you are on the way to the pertinent answer.
The ultimate freedom from the nonexistent ego is to see that it is actually irrelevant.
Unless you're continually improving your skills, you're quickly becoming irrelevant.
There is hardly any one so insignificant that he does not seem imposing to some one at some time.
Irrelevant religion pleads legitimacy.
My country has contrived for me the most insignificant office that ever the invention of man contrived or his imagination conceived.
Facts are irrelevant. What matters is what the consumer believes.
I love being irreverent. But I hate being irrelevant. I love being irreverent because at the end of the day your actions belie your intentions.
Reality is irrelevant; Perception is everything.
Never use tricky or irrelevant headlinesâ€¦ People read too fast to figure out what you are trying to say.
To be irrelevant is to categorize your live into separate pursuit.

Being made to feel like an irrelevant child was probably an asset. Benign negligence is not a bad parental attitude or at least a cross between a benevolent dictator and benign negligence you should just let kids crack on with it.
I see now that the circumstances of ones birth are irrelevent. it is what you do with the gift of life that determines who you are
To be irrelevant is to categorize your live into separate pursuit
Whether you succeed or not is irrelevant, there is no such thing. Making your unknown known is the important thing.
It is simple impertinence for any man, or any body of men, to begin, or to contemplate, reform of the whole world.
